Academic

Research Interests

Education

PhD in Computer Science - Computational Intelligence, 2017, Centers of Informatics - Federal University of Pernambuco - Recife, Brazil. Thesis: Dynamic Selection of Time Series Forecasting Combiners (in portuguese)

MSc in Computer Science - Computational Intelligence, 2013, Centers of Informatics - Federal University of Pernambuco - Recife, Brazil. Thesis: Reservoir Computing Optimization with PSO (in portuguese)

Bachelor in Computer Engineering, 2008, Polytechnic School of Pernambuco - University of Pernambuco - Recife, Brazil, Laureate Student. Thesis: Computational Modeling of Alzheimer’s Disease Symptoms Using Venn’s Network (in portuguese)

Supervised Research Projects

Undergraduate Theses

de Albuquerque, R.A.L.. Uso de Aprendizado de Máquinas para Otimizar as Decisões Relativas a Investimentos Imbobiliários Residenciais (in portuguese). 2024. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science – CESAR School, Recife.
